transArray.content: I am very satisfied with the experience. The location of the hotel is easy to find. The lady at the front desk is very welcoming. She will greet you when you enter the door and pour tea. Check-in can be done contactlessly. There is also a food delivery robot. There is also a washing machine and dryer on the first floor, which is very convenient. The room is also very clean. I slept very comfortably. I am very satisfied!

Dear guest, thank you for staying at Beijing Chaoyang Park Qiaodong Branch and giving us a favorable review. The hotel belongs to the Hanting 2.7 version. The products are very new and clean. It is also very close to Chaoyang Joy City. You can shop and eat there. It is very convenient. There is a free parking lot and laundry room. I hope this hotel will become your first choice in Beijing. We sincerely look forward to your visit again!
